attributes.review: This app kept glitching and showing Donald Trump with his TERRIFYING spray tan! As a voter in the 2020 election, I wanted to explore both candidates. Instead, I found Trump has done nothing for this country! He’s just a Cheeto! I don’t wanna see a glitching Cheeto on my screen!
attributes.title: Terrible App

attributes.review:

attributes.review: this was a horrible app. as soon as i pressed open ants started crawling out of my phone. and then they swarmed all around me and started saying some weird spell. that spell brought some witch to life and the witch turned my house into an orange. i told the witch to stop and she said this is for trump and blew my pet lizard up. she said trump hired her. then my friend came over with their pet lizard and the witch blew that lizard up too. this app was bad!
attributes.title: lizard
